EmailTemplate.name: Optimize_Public_Cloud_Spend_Nurture.Optimize_Public_Cloud_Spend_Nurture_3_Webina
EmailTemplate.subject: How do you manage your public cloud spend?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/optimize-public-cloud-spend/cloud-cost-control-in-server-and-storage]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Many enterprises that utilize the public cloud struggle to assure performance while also managing cost. What should you and your team be doing today to ensure cloud success while minimizing spend?
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/optimize-public-cloud-spend/cloud-cost-control-in-server-and-storage]]>
Watch this webcast <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/optimize-public-cloud-spend/cloud-cost-control-in-server-and-storage]]> to learn more about public cloud cost control for server and storage.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
